Articles.Content:
In the latest video of my Kerbal Space Program LP I decided to show off my Mars Curiosity style lander that I made a couple weeks ago!

I first launch the lander into orbit, do a de-orbit burn and detach the lander. Next I enter the atmosphere and lose some speed with my heat shield.

After losing my heat shield I deploy my parachute which will only slow me down to about 27 m/s so when I get close to the ground I fire up my rockets which are stacked on top of decouplers.

With my ASAS on I slow all the way down to the point where my parachute goes away and I lower myself to 2 feet off the ground at a hover and drop my pod, having my rockets fly away.

If you would be so kind, watch this video on my channel, not the thumbnail. A like would be nice, so would a positive comment but a subscription would mean a lot to me. I post daily KSP videos and

am starting a minecraft lp.
nice. i never seen a video of a curiosity landing without any mods. good job!
Thank you! Would you mind subscribing? It would mean a lot and I upload ksp videos daily.
